name: Phantom F4
overview: An action full-graphic game, in the style of American action adventure films. A group of armed terrorists broke into the apartment of a Slovak millionaire, from where they forcibly dragged away his only daughter. According to unverified reports, the terrorists managed to fly to one of the Pacific islands where they have their base. Here they are well fortified and with a high probability they will demand a huge ransom for the life of the kidnapped girl. The unfortunate parents are willing to pay a large reward to save their daughter. Will you, in the role of the pilot of the PHANTOM F4 fighter who accidentally intercepted this message, manage to shoot through the poor girl's neck and free her from the humiliating involuntary captivity?
